__e: But the cattle are as much yours as they are mine... so the deci...
You reckon them cows are worth getting killed over?
All that cattle lost, maybe you'll tell us who did it.
Men you pay to protect your cattle.
They'll take away your land, your cattle... your house, everything you've built up.
And $25o for me Leaving your stock alone.
Didn't they stampede those cattle and try to hang it on me.
They stampeded the cattle... Then picked us off one by one as we came out.
Way I figure it, we can leave the cattle and run, or you and me can go in the dark and stop them before they scatter the herd.
I figured they should not have turned back and taken my cattle with them.
I see now why you don't need guns... and why I can't get my cattle through.
I don't know what a stream is supposed to do... but it's killing my cattle, and I want it stopped.
